the summit on 6th is a luxury condominium located in mid-wilshire north of koreatown. the subject unit consists one bedroom, one full bath and one half bath, inside laundry, kitchen with granite counter, center island, upgraded cabinetry, and stainless steel appliances. living/family room combination has views to north, bamboo hardwood floors, designers light fixtures. master bedroom has views and has a walk-in closet, large master bathroom with tile/travertine tub, shower enclosure, granite counter top and upgraded cabinetry. facility offers golf simulator, state of the art gym, sauna, 24/7 security guard and private concierge service. plenty of restaurants, shops, and public transportation are just outside the door and numerous entertainment and nightlife places abound. owner needs to rent back until november, 2018.

Brand New Construction Italian Mediterranean private and gated Hollywood Hills home with spectacular city light and Hollywood hills VIEW . You will enjoy the panoramic views from every room. Indoors and outdoors from the beautiful and expansive travertine tiled deck around the salt water pool & spa .This home equipped with all advanced amenities including a sophisticated security system, built-in audio, fire sprinklers, drip irrigation and smart home features allowing local, remote and programmable control of all of the home's electronic and security systems. Large 2 car garage plus additional parking. There are exotic hardwood floors throughout the house. The luxurious master bedroom takes full advantage of the spectacular views. You won't find anything comparable in this price range . Minutes to Hollywood, Sunset strip, Universal city. --

Own a piece of LA history! This 11th floor, charming and bright east facing corner unit in the historic Bartlett building is the perfect home for those looking for vibrant urban living in the center of the city. Enjoy the morning sun flooding through the unit's 8 oversized historical windows while enjoying a gorgeous view over the Bunker Hill skyline and Spring Street. The unit has been freshly painted and is move-in ready! Take advantage of the building's Mills Act approval, which allows the new owners to save big on property taxes. The Bartlett building offers a 24/7 front desk and security, and a rooftop to relax and to admire the building's 360 degree view of Downtown. This is the perfect place to unwind and enjoy LA's beautiful sunsets, or to simply entertain your friends! This beautiful Beaux Art building couldn't be more centrally located, with Whole Foods, the new Nomad Hotel, Bottega Louie, Grand Central Market, The Spring Arcade and a Metro station all nearby.

Brand new ultra modern NON Rent control building with in walking distance to Culver City Art's district. All units are town house style 3 stories with attached enclosed garages. This is a great opportunity for owner occupant or investor. At an estimated cap rate of 5.51 this is a bargain. The property is located in a cul de sac street. All units have custom kitchen cabinetry, quartz counter tops, laminate floors through out, tiled bathrooms, central air and heat, all stainless steel appliances and washer dryer hookups in each unit. Another beautiful rehab completed by Aquario Investment Group. No expense was spared on this beautiful 3 bedroom, 3 bath remodeled home, located in the Beverlywood Area of Los Angeles. Dual pane windows provide tons of natural light throughout the home. Brand new central AC and heating systems will keep this beautiful home at the perfect temperature throughout the year. The gorgeous kitchen, perfect for any budding chef, features an abundance of new white shaker cabinets, beautiful granite countertops, carrara marble backsplash and brand new top of the line stainless steel appliances. This kitchen opens up to the dining room. The living room includes a beautiful fireplace perfect for those rainy winter days. The large master bedroom has a large closet and an en-suite bathroom. all three bathrooms have been beautifully appointed with new vanities, top of the line fixtures, low flow toilets and custom tile work throughout. The front and backyard have been stunningly landscaped and include an automated sprinkler system. This house is just stunning!

**Price reduced by $305,000 - New asking price is $2,995,000** The Mariposa Development Site is a fully entitled and approved development site for 12 townhouses situated on a large and vacant 16,500 square foot lot. The plans call for a unit mix that consists of 10 units that are two-bedrooms with two and one half bathrooms and two units that are three-bedrooms with two and one half bathrooms. The units are all two stories with private roof top decks over a level of on-grade parking for 30 vehicles. Upon completion, the units could be sold separately as condominiums or retained as an income producing property. The property is zoned (Q)R3-1 and appears to, per a 1989 Zone Change Ordinance Sheet, have a height limit of 30 feet and density of one unit per 1,200 sq ft. Buyer to independently verify all aspects of this development opportunity including zoning and the status of the current plans. The property is situated on the border of Hollywood and Koreatown.

Luxury Contemporary home in the heart of Brentwood! Located on a beautiful tree-lined street, blocks from the best shopping and restaurants San Vicente has to offer. This 4 bedroom, 4.5 bathroom detached townhouse features 3,200 square feet of living space, expansive high ceilings, incredible natural light, and designer finishes throughout. The perfect open floor-plan where every room flows seamlessly to the next. The first floor features the formal living, dining, family room and office, along with gourmet chefs kitchen with Italian designed cabinets, Caesarstone countertops and top of the line appliances. The second level offers 4 spacious bedrooms, each with their own en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet. The Master suite features a beautiful fireplace, balcony, 2 walk-in closets, and a gorgeous master bathroom with dual sinks, Carrara marble floor & stand-alone tub. Welcome to 1366 S. Orange Drive, a stunning Spanish-style duplex in the heart of one of LA's most flourishing and burgeoning neighborhoods. This is an impressive, generously-sized and immaculately-maintained 1930's home. Sunlight pours through the large picture windows in both units, each spanning more than 1,400 sf. Perfect as an income property or as a place to call home on a charming and quiet block! Both units have been updated, whilst still maintaining the original charm of the building. Open and flooded with light, enjoy gatherings in the generously-sized living area graced by a fireplace and attached balcony (top unit) and host fantastic dinner parties in your formal dining room. Outside you'll find a gorgeous manicured garden anchored by orange, lemon and pomegranate trees. The location gives easy access to to the beach, downtown, freeways and the airport. Both will be delivered vacant!

Cultural Historic Monument #235: Lloyd Wright's Henry Bollman Residence. By the early 1920's Lloyd Wright had accumulated experience in theatre, music, landscape, & architectural design. Working associations with his father, Olmsted & Olmsted, Irving Gill, Rudolph Schindler, & Norman Bel Geddes contributed to his personal vision of a new architecture integrating his total experience. Here in his second commission, Wright's vision is expressed through a building system utilizing pre-cast concrete blocks to augment standard construction techniques. The massing of the blocks unites ground & structure, as well as imparting a temple-like feeling to the facade. Style elements draw from theatrical & Meso-american precedents which, when translated to the interiors, impart a sense of drama & intimacy. Anchor of the Sunset Square Historic Preservation Overlay Zone, the Bollman Residence has earned two covers of Architectural Digest, & with the new owner's improvements could deserve a third.

Cultural Historic Monument #235: Lloyd Wright's Henry Bollman Residence. By the early 1920's Lloyd Wright had accumulated experience in theatre, music, landscape, & architectural design. Working associations with his father, Olmsted & Olmsted, Irving Gill, Rudolph Schindler, & Norman Bel Geddes contributed to his personal vision of a new architecture integrating his total experience. Here in his second commission, Wright's vision is expressed through a building system utilizing pre-cast concrete blocks to augment standard construction techniques. The massing of the blocks unites ground & structure, as well as imparting a temple-like feeling to the facade. Style elements draw from theatrical & Meso-american precedents which, when translated to the interiors, impart a sense of drama & intimacy. Anchor of the Sunset Square Historic Preservation Overlay Zone, the Bollman Residence has earned two covers of Architectural Digest, & with the new owner's improvements could deserve a third.

Upgrades galore including new plumbing, updated electrical, dark gray wood laminate floors, paneled doors with matte black hardware, new lighting throughout, pops of brushed gold custom fixtures and much more. Front door opens to spacious Living/Dining Room with lots of bright-open living space. Mediterranean inspired tile finishing the faux fireplace is the living room focal point. High ceilings give the entire home a spacious feel. Recessed lighting, custom finishes, crown molding and decorative base boards modernize the living areas and the preserved architectural details like dual cadi-corner built-in buffets maintain the homes original charm. Kitchen is lovely with its brushed gold commercial fixtures, 24x24 statuary marble-like tile flooring, granite countertops and walls of white subway tiles. Adjacent indoor laundry room has ample space for full sized appliances, storage and access to back yard. All bedrooms have new ceiling fans and walk-in closets. The spacious bathroom features dramatic black and white tile, white subway tiled walls, a new soaking tub and low-flush toilet. Bonus room has a separate entry from back yard, walls of windows and a large walk-in closet offering many options such as third bedroom, office or family room. Det. garage is finished and ready to become a man-cave, studio or workshop. New custom built barn-inspired driveway and side gates provide privacy. Drought resistant landscaped and both yards incl. new sprinkler systems. Oversized lot is great for entertaining or expansion. Property is conveniently located near the 105 fwy and walking distance to the Metro. 10 minutes from LAX and most downtown destinations!

This private home in the exclusive Mountaingate Estates, is packed with elegant character. 12743 Promontory Road sits on a corner lot on the high side of the street, providing an impressive collection of mountain and city views. A vaulted entryway welcomes guests into a home built for entertaining. The ground floor has both casual and formal areas; a sitting room with a bar and a fire place off the kitchen and a dining room that can easily cradle a 10-person banquet table. A huge living room with another fireplace is the perfect place for a larger gathering, with direct access to the wraparound courtyard and built-in outdoor grill. The second floor is for you. 3 bedrooms and 3 en-suite bathrooms offer privacy and comfort. The true gem of the home is the nearly 1400 sq. ft. master suite; high ceilings, large balcony, a sitting room and fire place, another 190 sq. ft. of closets, and a bathroom larger than a studio apartment. There is something special at every turn through this home.

FIXER!!! Calling all contractors for this prime opportunity in the up and coming El Sereno neighborhood of Los Angeles in LA-RD3 Zoning! For ALL-CASH Investors! This Fixer-Upper is 3 bedrooms and 1 bath, plus a den, on a 7,012 sqft lot, and a 3-car garage. It features a Batchelder style fireplace, barrel ceiling and built-in shelves in the living room. Centrally located near the 710, 110, 10, & 5 fwy's, it's a short drive to Downtown LA, and plenty of local public transportation.

Welcome home to this quaint 1920's Hancock Park Bungalow, conveniently located moments from the heart of Larchmont Village! Entering through the large arched front doorway, you are greeted by a bright interior living room anchored by a stunning Bachelder fireplace. This cozy home features beautiful hardwood floors, coved ceilings and doorways, French windows and a separate laundry room. The charming and private backyard provides an ideal setting for relaxation, while sipping a glass of lemonade made from your very own lemon tree!

Step into a breathtaking Silver Lake Gem/Glamorous Tree-house. This split-level Spanish Bungalow in the Silver Lake hills sits on an expansive lot offering stunning views of the Griffith Park Observatory, Hollywood Sign & surrounding hills. An open plan design provides plenty of natural light for sun kissed afternoons while the hillside lot allows for plenty of outdoor living space with a diverse selection of pines, palms, succulents & other trees. Hardwood flooring, built-in cabinetry, and other unique features makes for a perfect Silver Lake property. Located near Bellevue Park, south of Sunset Blvd., and close to the Silver Lake Farmer's Market, Cafe Stella, Intelligentsia Coffee and surrounding shops. A rare & uniquely private property.

Brand New Architectural home, located on a quiet tree-lined street in one of the most coveted neighborhoods in West LA with walking distance to a Stoner park and minutes away from an Expo line. This home has it all: stunning architectural exterior, low maintenance finishes, built-in surround sound system and smart lighting by Lutron, large open floor plan with ample room for entertaining, private enormous back yard, beautifully designed interior and plenty of natural sunlight. This stunning new construction welcomes you with soaring 24-foot ceilings into the sun-drenched great room with combined living area, dining area and gourmet kitchen that opens up through the glass sliding doors to a private back yard with plenty of room for a pool. Oversized master suite, featuring His and Her closets and a sitting area. With 3000 square feet of living space this home boasts 2 more spacious bedrooms, an additional family room/den and an office on the main floor.

Modern meets luxury at this 1 bed, 1 bath condo. The open-space floor plan allows plenty of room for entertaining or relaxing, offering natural lighting, wood floors, a charming dining nook, and a fireplace in the spacious living room. The short steps at the entryway point to the kitchen, where wood cabinets, stainless steel appliances, and unique, modern storage options create the perfect place to find your inner chef. Relax in the bathroom's glass-enclosed shower, which has marbled walls and colorful tile flooring, before taking advantage of the extra counter and cabinet space. In the airy bedroom, natural light from the large window brightens the hardwood floors and fills the room. Mirrored doors on the large closet and a unique under-window shelf add the finishing touches. This condo offers plenty of storage and a washer/dryer combination. With access to the community courtyard in this elaborate condo community, you will quickly find a home in your new living space.

Stylish Mid-Century mixed with traditional architecture in a Beachwood Canyon view home. Exposed beams, hardwood floors, large windows to allow ample light. Newly remodeled kitchen and living area. Take in the wonderful view as you entertain your guests or maybe just relax on the balcony with a glass of wine over-looking the canyon and city lights. Opportunity to remodel the master bedroom to add a bathroom en suite (check with city) and really add more to this house. Huge upside is that the home is truly turn-key. Fresh paint abounds and many systems have been recently updated to include new sewer line, roof, electrical, earthquake retrofitting, and more. The location is perfect. Quick access to the 101 makes commuting to the Studios, WeHo, Downtown, or the Valley a breeze. Hop in an Uber and shoot over to The Bowl or into Hollywood to the Pantages for a show. Dinner on Hillhurst or right down the hill to the great restaurants, cafes, and wine bars in Beachwood or on Franklin.

Nestled among the highly-coveted streets of North Kentwood stands this classic Westchester home. Lush landscaping and a soft blue door invite you inside, where you are greeted by a spacious, sunlight-filled living room with a brick-accented fireplace and crown molding throughout. Adjacent to the dining area, the kitchen features stainless steel appliances, custom cabinetry, and plenty of counter space for food prep. Enjoy meals inside or dine al fresco on the private backyard patio. Beyond the patio, the terraced backyard boasts a lush lawn and mature landscaping. Rejuvenate in the master suite, a generously sized retreat with bay windows that offer views to the manicured backyard, ample closet space, and an elegant en-suite. Three additional bedrooms, with one currently used as a den, a spacious full bathroom, and a powder room complete the layout of this well-appointed home. With plenty of storage space, gorgeous lighting, and elegant accents throughout, this home is a must see.

Discover a hidden gem in Echo Park hills. A quintessential Echo Park Spanish courtyard compound with 1930's details that will make your heart swoon. Perched atop a hill w/ views of Echo Park hills, landscaped gardens and pathways, arched doorways, high coved ceilings, original 1930's tiles in bath, and more. Formal dining room with French doors leading to an enclosed porch, built-in closets and original hardwood floors. Perfectly situated North of Sunset, off Echo Park Avenue, a block to Pollen and a couple blocks to the hikes and trails in Elysian Park. Close to local hotspots: Chango, Valerie, Cookbook and more. Wake up to the sound of chirping birds in this cozy single-level home. With an open floor plan and insulation that keeps it warm in the winter and cool in the summer, this home creates year-round comfort. French doors in the master bedroom open to a pleasantly private back yard getaway filled with grass and fruit trees. The tranquil, spacious front porch is accented with attractive tile and abundant greenery. You'll enjoy the convenience of a centrally located laundry and two full bathrooms. In the kitchen you'll find granite counters, a gas range, and ample storage space. All this within easy reach of downtown, with Trader Joe's and Whole Foods nearby!

This south facing live/work loft at the Eastern Columbia clears the neighboring buildings and affords unobstructed views from east to west. This open studio presents a streamlined kitchen, laundry hook-ups and a designer bath with a deep soaking tub. The Eastern is well known for its beautiful common areas which include the spacious lobby, private entrance from garage, mail center, an amazing rooftop pool, spa, fireplace sitting area and workout room. There is a Zen garden and water wall in the back patio. The front desk staff, on-site property manager and engineer help make this a very enjoyable place to call home. Unit comes with one parking space in the secured parking garage which is attached to the building. This historic landmark has the Mills Act in place for substantial property tax reductions. Located at the intersection of South Park, the Fashion District and the Historic Core, this neighborhood features some of LA's most desirable and trendy retail stores and restaurants.

With sweeping views of the Silver Lake Reservoir, the John R. Hunt House (Historic-Cultural Monument No. 704) sits proudly above the street. At over 4,200 sq. ft., this Spanish Colonial Revival is replete with grand public & private living spaces & architectural details worthy of its heritage. Original magnesite foyer with hand treated walls, lead you to the spacious living room. Metal encased arched windows frame mesmerizing views of the Reservoir. The formal dining room complete with period fixtures flows to the remodeled chef's kitchen. A bedroom with original tiled bath complete the main level. Up the stained glass stairway find 3 master-sized bedrooms each with walk-in closets & 2 vintage tiled baths. A spacious lower level with separate entrance, bath & private patio, create an ideal creative space or guest suite. Multiple outdoor entertaining areas & private hot tub with unbeatable views! Take this Mills Act property to the next level. Ivanhoe School District.

This is a great opportunity to own a duplex with a large R2 lot in the Westchester-Nielson Neighborhood north of Manchester Ave between Westport Heights and Osage. The property offers 2 one bedroom / one bath units with hardwood floors, dual pane windows, laundry in units, and a large backyard with fruit trees. There is a 2 car garage with a long driveway and off street parking. This property is close to Playa Del Rey, Playa Vista, Marina Del Rey, Loyola Marymount University, the Howard Hughes Center, Downtown Culver City, LAX, the beaches, and so much more. One of the units is vacant and available for viewing.

An incredible an rare opportunity to own a small slice of heaven in Echo Park! This 1930's Spanish Courtyard with 4 units is tucked up in Echo Park hills, a few blocks to the parks and trails in Elysian Park, a block away from Pollen restaurant, and up the street from Valerie, Chango and more. Located in the back of the property, this lower unit takes up the entire ground floor and features a private outdoor yard and covered patio. Classic 1930's details and charm throughout, original hexagonal tiles in the bathroom, arched doorways and French windows. The master bedroom and bathroom open to a covered patio. TIC sale w/ financing available - as little as 10% down. See private remarks. A great condo alternative. The days are getting longer, sprouts and blooms appear on the flora around. All seen through the wood framed windows of the sunny bungalow, a well crafted space, with all the delightful elements we love. An open floor plan with plenty of vintage character, wood floors, yummy clawfoot tub and the practical amenities for modern day living, HVAC, dishwasher and retrofitted foundation. A home to take hiatus from the bustling city, a quiet space. A sunroom, accessed through second bedroom or laundryroom, to call one's own, where books are read, words written, looks out onto the garden. Fabulous and stunning new construction sets itself apart in trendy Palms/Mar Vista area. This home features 5 bedrooms, and 4.5 exquisite bathrooms. The open and inviting floor plan is vibrant with natural light. The family room is centered around a sleek modern fireplace. Tucked away from the living area, this home features an open gourmet kitchen with top of the line Thermador appliances, built-in wine fridge, large center island, quartz counters and gorgeous custom cabinets. Master bedroom includes a custom walk-in closet and personal balcony. Master en suite bathroom is adorned with large marble tile, a lavish walk-in shower, soaking tub, and beautiful double vanity. This large corner lot has a custom-built metal fence, luscious green landscaping and newly planted ficus trees that offer plenty of privacy. Bring your clients today to experience the best of California living in this booming area of Westside Village that falls within the Clover Elementary School District

Live in this Contemporary house on the hill in Highland Park! The largest on the block, this home is attentively maintained and is the perfect, move-in ready place for a family. The combination of ample square footage and a centralized floor plan allows for plenty of personal space for everyone, while remaining connected in the common spaces downstairs or the family room upstairs. The Bamboo Hardwood Floors and Bay Windows throughout the home allow for lots of natural sunlight. The tiered back deck is perfect for entertaining guests with lots of shade and peek a boo city views. If dancing is your thing, you can bring the party inside to the dance studio. But, if you have two left feet, this bonus recreation space would be great for a man cave or movie room! Located North of York where Avenue 57 and Eaton St meet, you will be just up the street from neighborhood favorites like Maximilianos, The Hi Hat, Donut Friend, and Highland Park Brewery.

Just REMODELED! A huge motor court welcomes you to over 9,300 sq.ft (per owner) w/ 5 bed/5.5 baths. Plus, an attached guest house w/1 bed/1 bath/kitchen/living room. Dramatically, high ceilings w/ an open floor plan. Enormous living room connects to an informal area & simultaneously to the sizable dining room which ties into the chef's kitchen. Kitchen boasts European finishes, Ceaserstone ~ countertops and all Miele~ appliances, including, built in fridge, coffee maker, and wine tower! The East Wing of the home has a massive theater room, two bedrooms, plus a junior master suite that opens up to an outdoor patio area & connects to the gym. The vast master suite has endless closet space & dual, luxurious baths. The West Wing of the home has another bedroom & en-suite bath, plus bonus office and/or lounge areas. Beautiful SFV & Universal Studio views from the pool/spa. Truly a celebrity-worthy compound!

Simply stunning Country English 3 bedroom 2 bath home with many rare extras located in the heart of Westwood. Stylistically beautiful high pitched ceilings, formal living room with grand fireplace and adjacent den/media room. Upgraded open gourmet chef's kitchen with an ideal island, wine fridge, stainless steel appliances, and tons of quality cabinets all leading to an exceptional outdoor entertainment deck with built in outdoor TV and fireplace. Perfect for taking advantage of Southern California weather. Oversized master bedroom with large dual closets and tons of storage. There is an entire second floor that offers expanded functionality as home office, play rooms, storage or guest rooms. Immaculate detached garage is perfect for covered parking and more storage. The surrounding hedged backyard is private with plenty of fruit trees. Located central to the new Eataly at Century City mall, Westwood Charter school, and easy access to entertainment, restaurants, parks, Expo, etc.

Side-by-side Spanish duplex with loads of potential in prime Atwater Village. Delivered vacant and ready for your vision, both units have floor plans which mirror each other. Enter from the front patio into an open living room and dining room with coved ceilings, original windows and hardwood floors underneath the carpet. Off the hallway you will find access to a well sized vintage kitchen with adjoining utility room, two bedrooms and a full bath. A door at the rear of the center hall has been opened up between the two units allowing for a flexible configuration. In need of a little love, this duplex offers a myriad of options - Live in one and help off-set your mortgage by renting the other, or rent them both knowing Atwater Village has incredibly strong rental demand. Conveniently located between Glendale & Los Feliz Blvds with easy access to all the best shops & restaurants in Atwater Village, plus the best Sunday Farmer's Market in NELA.

Welcome to Beverly Grove's best value. Fully remodeled in 2011, this gated, hedged, and private open-plan home offers 3 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms, along with spacious side and back yards for entertaining. Enter the home through an airy living room, dining room, and kitchen area, surrounded by picture frame windows on every wall. Down the hardwood hallway are 2 additional bedrooms and bathrooms that flow on to the master suite at the back of the home. The master suite features a spa-like en-suite bath, completed just last year. The large side and back yards are bright and quiet with low-maintenance landscaping and a new outdoor kitchen and bar area. The detached 2-car garage has electric car charging and plenty of storage. A stone's throw from Hancock Park Elementary and blocks to world class shopping, dining, and entertainment of The Grove and W. 3rd Street. This home is truly an incredible combination of value, accessibility, privacy, and modernity.

This front corner live/work loft is one of the most sought-after layouts in the Eastern Columbia with expansive views down Broadway, 9th St and out to South Park. Designed as an open loft-style space while providing maximum privacy for 2 bedrooms/2 baths with plenty of storage. Upgrades include finished ceilings, custom lighting, pocket doors, closets, pantry, shelving, maple hardwood floors, tiled entry and baths. Custom designed kitchen island with maple wood block top. Double-paned windows installed with custom shades to cut down on noise, dust and summer heat. One parking space included. Enjoy all the building has to offer including the beautiful resort-like rooftop pool, gym, fireplace and lounge area. With on-site management and 24/7 front desk staff this is the best luxury building in downtown's fastest growing neighborhood featuring some of LA's most desirable retail stores and restaurants. This historic landmark has the Mills Act in place for SUBSTANTIAL property tax savings.

Completely renovated in 2017 down to the studs, this Coastal Cape Cod/Modern resort style single level home w/classical beauty located in most sought after street in the entire North Kentwood comm., featuring 4br+3bth w/2300sf of living space on an oversized 7500sf lot. Open floor plan w/dual fireplaces in living & Dining, gourmet kitchen anchored by a large center island, breakfast nook, custom cabinets and high end stainless steal appliances. ADDITIONAL 360sf of detached rec-room/pool/office built in 2008, with half bath can be converted to legal ADU. Heated saltwater pool/spa w/Baja/water features w/remote control, gourmet outdoor cooking system & seating with fire pit, adobe 7 HTD full Wi-Fi controlled sound system, complete house water filtration & Tank-less water system, master bath w/European tub & steam shower, 8 security camera surveillance system w/DVR & alarm system, 8" privacy fence throughout. This is a true entertainers paradise and a resort lifestyle.

Turn key move in ready. New double pane windows to keep utility bills lower and reduce outside noise. New wrought iron fence in front and new water heater. Three good sized bedrooms and indoor laundry room. Two car carport plus three more cars can park in the driveway. Newly painted inside and outside and new wall to wall carpeting. Large kitchen with eating area and a refrigerator. Good sized front yard and security bars on windows.

NON RENT CONTROL BUILDING DELIVERED VACANT! Fully renovated with high-end designer finishes, perfect for owner/user or investor that wants to capture the highest local rents. Resting on a large 7417+/- sqft corner lot, and consisting of 2-story, side-by-side duplex and separate detached apartment. Unit #1 is approx 1350sqft, 3bdrm/3.5ba, all ensuite with lovely balcony off master, laundry room and powder. Professionally landscaped with 2 separate 2-car garages. Centrally located, this thriving district is convenient to DTLA, Culver City, WeHo, Hollywood and Beverly Hills.

Located in the historic Hermon pocket of Highland Park, this dreamy 1901 farmhouse has recently undergone an extensive designer renovation. 4 bedrooms, 3.5 baths, and 1,800 sq ft of living space have been thoughtfully updated in a neutral palate with white oak flooring and black hardware accents throughout. A gourmet kitchen with quartz counter tops, red oak shelving, and a commercial-grade convection oven will inspire you to create while a freshly landscaped private yard and deck encourage you to unwind. Two generously appointed master suites, custom bathroom vanities with porcelain vessel sinks, dual pane windows, new HVAC & Nest thermostat, a soaking tub, a Dutch door, and an upgraded foundation are just the beginning. This lovely home is minutes from Debs Park, Hermon Park, and the Arroyo Seco with easy access to multiple hiking and bike trails, a dog park, tennis courts, and playgrounds + Trader Joe's in South Pasadena and all the latest offerings from the Fig/York corridor.

Views, Views, Views! Best unit in the building. Westerly facing views of Hollywood sign, Griffith Observatory and more. Roof-top Pool, Gym, Sauna, Two parking spots, on street level, with its own APN- Bring your vision, ready to be re-imagined. Only (2) blocks from the new 6th Street Target & Starbucks! First time on market in 40 years. This is a rare offering! Public community room for your parties- BBQ area for public use. Well maintained, quiet building in the heart & best street in Koreatown.

Gorgeous 2 bed + 3 bath 2-story penthouse condo with huge rooftop deck on a quiet residential street in Brentwood. Tons of natural light pour through the floor to ceiling windows in this wonderful open floor plan, large living room with 20' ceilings and open kitchen with breakfast bar. Hardwood floors, stainless steel appliances, plantation shutters, central A/C, laundry in unit, 2 car tandem parking and extra storage are just a few of the many features. The second bedroom with en-suite bathroom opens up to a large private roof top deck- perfect for entertaining or a cozy spot to unwind at the end of the day. Located just a short stroll to great shopping, restaurants and the Farmer's Market. Enjoy!

MOTIVATED SELLER!!!!! ZONE R-3 - OPTIONS TO BUILD UNITS! Cosmetic work , save on this deal. Make this the home of your dream, Prime location next to Hancock Park! Prefer CASH! Hancock Park is a genteel residential enclave dating back to the 1920s. Well-preserved mansions in architectural styles such as Tudor and Italian Revival occupy large lots with broad lawns and porticos. Surrounding the Wilshire Country Club, the area includes Windsor Square and Larchmont Village, which features a quaint shopping and dining strip. Close to Koreatown's many bars and casual 24/7 dining makes for a buzzing late-night scene. There are Korean BBQ restaurants with tabletop grills, plus karaoke joints, hip speakeasies and flashy clubs, as well as the landmark Wiltern Theatre, an art deco music venue. K-town's dense mix of historic buildings and contemporary complexes also features traditional spas, bubble tea cafes and specialty grocery stores.

This property is in the Mount Washington neighborhood. Mount Washington is a hilly residential neighborhood in the hills of northeastern Los Angeles. Mount Washington lies halfway between downtown L.A. and Pasadena. Mount Washington is nestled in between Glassell Park to the northwest, Eagle Rock to the north, Highland Park to the northeast, Montecito Heights to the southeast, across the Arroyo Seco, and Cypress Park to the southwest. One of the many attractive features of living in the hills of Mount Washington is that it boasts views of the San Gabriel Valley and Los Angeles Basin to the Pacific Ocean on clear days. The hills provide mounds of green with views of downtown L.A., the San Gabriel Mountains, tranquil canyons, hillsides, and valleys. This is one of the only neighborhoods in metro L.A. that still has significant numbers of trees and wildlife. Homes in the neighborhood's award-winning, Mount Washington Elementary School district, command top dollars and sell quickly when it comes in the market.

Public rooms finished in Venetian plaster exude a relaxed elegance. A full-size pool, pool house, jacuzzi and cold plunge invite relaxation and recreation in the serene gardens. Details were sourced the world over, including: reclaimed roof tile from Venezuela, reclaimed fireplace mantles and tile floors of Italian terra cotta, custom ironwork, Moroccan glazed bathroom tiles and hand-hewn American hardwood flooring. Additional amenities include a screening room, sauna, walking paths, 2 outdoor fireplaces, and outdoor dining.

Originally built by Wallace Neff in 1968 & expanded by Robert A.M. Stern in 1999, this approx 9,000+sf French Manor exudes characteristics of simplicity & strength recognizable as Neff's hand. The original Brentwood Park estate's parcel was divided in the late 60's. When the current owners purchased the property, they reassembled the original estate back to its previous grandeur spanning approx. 1.6 acres of gardens & grounds. Sumptuous & chic, brick wrap the exterior walls. 2nd story windows carry slightly into the roof dormers while ground flr windows resemble French doors. The 2story central hall rises as the focal point of the classical plan. The master suite features sep his/hers baths & walk-in closets. 3 full guest suites & maid's complete upstairs. The principal rms around the center are the LR, DR & FR w/ Neff's trademark vaulted-wood framed ceilings. Addtl amenities: pool hse w/ pool & spa, gym, security system & a 3,000sf 2-story GH w/ screening rm & tennis court & pavilion.
